text: Reginald John Cobb (July 7, 1968 – April 20, 2019) was an American football player. He played as a running back. He played seven seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for Tampa Bay Buccaneers (1990–1993), Green Bay Packers (1994), Jacksonville Jaguars (1995) and New York Jets (1996). He played college football for the Tennessee Volunteers of the University of Tennessee. He was born in Knoxville, Tennessee. Cobb died from a heart attack on April 20, 2019, at the age of 50. ==References== ==Other websites== * Reggie Cobb at NFL.com Category:1968 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Jacksonville Jaguars players Category:New York Jets players Category:Sportspeople from Knoxville, Tennessee Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Reggie Cobb
